video.title: The Magic School Bus
video.synopsis: Join Ms. Frizzle as the Magic School Bus travels to outer space, under the sea, through an anthill -- and even inside the human body!

episodes.synopsis: Arnold's know-it-all cousin Janet drives the kids crazy when she joins Ms. Frizzle's class on a field trip and gets them lost in outer space!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Gets Lost in Space

episodes.synopsis: When Arnold accidentally swallows his miniaturized class, his digestive system becomes the class field trip!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus for Lunch

episodes.synopsis: Why does Ralphie have a fever? Time for a field trip inside Ralphie's body to find out. But white blood cells start to attack the bus. Yikes!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Inside Ralphie

episodes.synopsis: Arnold and Keesha forget to bring in their assignment on "two things that go together." Just the moment for a field trip to the ocean!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Gets Eaten

episodes.synopsis: The class learns about habitats when Ms. Frizzle transforms the bus into a frog to help look for Wanda's missing pet frog.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Hops Home

episodes.synopsis: It's "Accidental Science Project" day, and the class has brought in marvelously rotten entries from the back of their refrigerators.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Meets the Rot Squad

episodes.synopsis: Always the caring soul, Phoebe goes on a crusade to save the animals and plants of the desert -- and discovers how well they take care of themselves.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus All Dried Up

episodes.synopsis: The class is thrilled about its concert at the Sound Museum -- until they discover the spooky mansion is more of a thrill than they bargained for.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus In The Haunted House

episodes.synopsis: It's Ms. Frizzle's birthday. A field trip to the bakery seems perfect, but the bus's shrinker-scope malfunctions and the class gets baked in a cake!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Gets Ready, Set, Dough

episodes.synopsis: Ms. Frizzle combines Dorothy Ann's physics and Ralphie's baseball into a "Frictionless Baseball Game."
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Plays Ball

episodes.synopsis: The class's garden is going to be featured on the cover of PLANT IT magazine, but Phoebe's garden plot is empty. Ms. Frizzle to the rescue!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Goes to Seed

episodes.synopsis: The Magic School Bus goes into an ant hive when Keesha directs a movie about social animals for the school science fair.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Gets Ants In Its Pants

episodes.synopsis: The Friz transforms the bus into a weathermobile, and in a wild ride through the skies, Ralphie becomes the meteorological superhero of his dreams.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Kicks Up a Storm

episodes.synopsis: To help them understand how the Earth makes islands, Ms. Frizzle presents the kids with an island that hasn't been discovered yet!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Blows Its Top

episodes.synopsis: Ms. Frizzle takes the class on a field trip to R.U. Humerus's Body Shop. They learn how bones, muscles and joints all work together to help us move.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Flexes Its Muscles

episodes.synopsis: The class needs a new mascot for its soccer team. Phoebe suggests butterflies, but everyone thinks they're wimpy -- until The Friz flutters in!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Butterfly and the Bog Beast

episodes.synopsis: Ms. Frizzle takes the class on a dinosaur dig, courtesy of her old school chum, a paleontologist, and travels 67 million years back in time!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus and The Busasaurus

episodes.synopsis: The class takes a wild ride with The Friz through the water cycle.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Wet All Over

episodes.synopsis: Keesha and the class return from vacation to find her prize cucumber has turned into a pickle! Could the Mike Robe gang be to blame?
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus in a Pickle

episodes.synopsis: The school district's Vehicle Maintenance Inspector, Junkett, is about to condemn the Magic School Bus!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Revving Up

episodes.synopsis: Shrunk inside Tim's model airplane, the class goes on a high-flying field trip to find out how things fly.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Taking Flight

episodes.synopsis: When Ms. Frizzle invites the class's parents to see what the kids are learning about bats, Ralphie and the gang are convinced the Friz is a vampire!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Going Batty

episodes.synopsis: The class is ready to plug in their "Double-Trouble Wheel of Wonder" at the town carnival, when they discover all the electrical outlets are taken.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Getting Energized

episodes.synopsis: When Dorothy Ann warns the kids there's an asteroid headed straight for their school, Ms. Frizzle arranges a field trip into space.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Out of This World

episodes.synopsis: Liz has gone off to a mysterious place called "Herp Haven." Thinking she's in trouble, the class rushes to Herp Haven, where they turn into reptiles.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Cold Feet

episodes.synopsis: A monster is in Walkerville Lake! Wanda wants to be the first one underwater, but a TV reporter whose ratings are sinking, wants her out of the way.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Ups and Downs

episodes.synopsis: "Where did the hot go?" wonders Arnold when his hot cocoa cools off. So, Ms. Frizzle whisks the class to the Arctic!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus In the Arctic

episodes.synopsis: Ms. Frizzle transports the class into a 1950s horror movie, where a 50-foot praying mantis is wrecking havoc on the town.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Spins a Web

episodes.synopsis: Two inches tall and trapped in a bathroom, the kids must use what they've learned about structures to escape before being discovered.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Under Construction

episodes.synopsis: For this field trip, Ms. Frizzle turns her class into bees and shows them a beehive up close and personal. Can you bee-lieve it?!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus In a Beehive

episodes.synopsis: Arnold's cousin wants to put on the best light show ever, but instead makes Arnold disappear! How can Ms. Frizzle shed some light on the problem?
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Gets a Bright Idea

episodes.synopsis: It's the International Show-and-Tell Competition. Arnold brings in a webbed hoop, given by his great-aunt, a famous archaeologist, but what is it?
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Shows and Tells

episodes.synopsis: Ms. Frizzle's class learns all about color, light beams, reflection and refraction in this dazzling episode inside a light-powered pinball machine!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Makes a Rainbow

episodes.synopsis: The Friz transforms the bus into a salmon! Now the bus has an uncontrollable urge to head upriver. Ms. Frizzle to the rescue!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Goes Upstream

episodes.synopsis: At this year's "Teacher-athalon," the kids fear Ms. Frizzle doesn't stand a chance against the muscle-bound gym teacher from another school.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Works Out

episodes.synopsis: Ms. Frizzle's class takes a field trip to a recycling plant, where they learn how everyday items are made from recycled trash.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Holiday Special

episodes.synopsis: To unearth the amazing ways plants make their own food, the Friz and the kids shrink down and dig deep in a quest to root out the facts!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Gets Planted

episodes.synopsis: The class learns about the rain forest's intricate web of life when they rent a rain forest cocoa tree as an Earth Day present for Ms. Frizzle.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus In the Rain Forest

episodes.synopsis: Ms. Frizzle's class sculpts a stone likeness of its founding father. As they add the finishing touches, the statue tumbles down the mountain.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Rocks and Rolls

episodes.synopsis: The principal leaves his beloved chicken, Giblets, in Dorothy Ann's care. The Friz takes the class on a field trip to see how eggs are made.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Cracks a Yolk

episodes.synopsis: Ms. Frizzle's "Uncle Shelby" lives on a beachfront property that's a tidal pool. Ms. Frizzle turns the kids into mussels to explore life at the shore!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Goes to Mussel Beach

episodes.synopsis: Ms. Frizzle and her class are under pressure, air pressure, that is, when they fly inside an empty jar to find out why plain old air is pushy stuff.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Goes on Air

episodes.synopsis: Should Walkerville get rid of the swamp to build a shopping mall? The class learns the swamp is an important habitat and natural water filter.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Gets Swamped

episodes.synopsis: Arnold is so excited to win the Rocky Award! But he's also so orange! The Magic School Bus takes a field trip to Arnold's cells to find out why.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Goes Cellular

episodes.synopsis: When Ms. Frizzle's class washes the car of a famous singer, the kids discover how to clean the car down to the very last molecule.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Meets Molly Cule

episodes.synopsis: When the kids see Horace Scope on the Star Shopping Network, they decide to buy Dorothy Ann a real twinkling star for her birthday.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Sees Stars

episodes.synopsis: Gravity pulls on Phoebe, so she can't slam dunk. Ms. Frizzle takes the class into space and turns the Bus into a planet with adjustable gravity!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Gains Weight

episodes.synopsis: Ms. Frizzle's class is selling light bulbs. But when they stop at her house, the Friz's battery-operated doorbell doesn't work. Electricity anyone?
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Gets Charged

episodes.synopsis: A Smell Expert comes to school to judge the First Annual Smell Search. Ms. Frizzle's class creates a unique smell that is bound to take first prize.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Makes a Stink

episodes.synopsis: When Wanda discovers that one of Ms. Frizzle's ancestors was Redbeard the Pirate, she naturally wants to follow the treasure map he left.
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Takes a Dive

episodes.synopsis: Ms. Frizzle's class is visiting the zoo. To test a theory about wild animals, Ms. Frizzle turns the class into possums, foxes, and falcons!
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus In the City

episodes.synopsis: When Ms. Frizzle shrinks the class and sends them inside the computer for a guided tour, everything goes haywire. How will they solve this problem?
episodes.title: The Magic School Bus Gets Programmed
